content.rendered:
MESSAGE FROM HEAD OF THE INSTITUTION

In today’s competitive world, a bachelor’s degree does not go far in bringing you to your dream job. Job oriented courses such as those offered by iREZ pave the way to a prestigious and lucrative career with the minimum of stress or effort.

From my viewpoint, assisted by my long tenure in teaching, industry and research, these courses mold the student to an unequivocally able and confident professional. The hands on experience provided arms the student to tackle the real world problems with panache and élan.

Internationally acclaimed certification also enables you to walk tall and be in demand anytime anywhere globally.

 

Prof: K H Salim

Head of Institution

QUALITY ASSURANCE

We promise you to deliver the assured quality

PROFESSIONAL TRAINING

Our training supports teachers to develop their foundational skills and knowledge

CREDITABLE INTEGERITY

We are committed to giving our 100% effort.

TEAM WORK

We are committed to giving our 100% effort.

1429
Placed Students
20
Courses
25678
Students Enrolled
2678
Certified Teachers

OUR MAIN COURSES

A choice that makes the difference.

oil and gas drilling
preparatory courses
NDT
QA QC ELECTRICAL
MEDICAL-BILLING
quantity survey
oil and gas engineering training
MEDICAL TRANSCRIPTION

"Student Delight" is the basic policy of our institution

HOD -IREZ ACADEMY

Meet Our Team

Plugins your themes with even more features.

Owen Christ
After working as a software developer and...
Namrata Parmar
I came to Eduma ten years ago
George Clinton
After working as a software developer and...
